mapper.select: select tf.id,tfr.taskId,tt.id as towerId,tt.coding as towerCoding,th.id as threadId,th.name as threadName,tk.taskMan from t_flaw_record tfr inner join t_flawconfirm tf on tfr.flawconfirmId = tf.id inner join t_tower tt on tf.towerId = tt.id inner join t_thread th on tf.threadId = th.id inner join t_task tk on tfr.taskId = tk.id where tfr.receiptState=1 and tf.confirmState=1 and tfr.taskId=#{taskId}
select count(1) from t_backlog t where t.isAccomplish=#{isAccomplish} AND t.userId=#{userId}
mapper.update: update t_backlog set isAccomplish=#{personalwork.isAccomplish} where id=#{personalwork.id}
